design_style.vibe: minimal, premium SaaS with soft gradients
visual_metaphors: dashboard with left sidebar and right inspector

common_alignments: top nav aligned to full width with centered content container
hero content centered with text above or beside a feature card
section titles left-aligned within centered container
dashboard: fixed-width left sidebar, fluid main canvas, fixed-width right panel

page_patterns: marketing page with top nav, hero, feature cards, product sections, testimonials, and footer
alternating light and dark content bands for major sections
card grid sections (2-up and 3-up on desktop)
application layout with vertical sidebar, main content canvas, and right properties panel
settings panels with stacked controls and labeled sliders

component_density.description: spacious but information-rich, with generous white space around major sections and tighter grouping within cards

usage_rules: background is a very light grey; most cards sit on top as pure white surfaces
primary gradient is reserved for hero highlights, featured cards, and key CTAs or selected states
solid black or very dark surfaces are used for contrast-heavy sections and some feature cards near the bottom of the page
subtle grey borders define cards and inputs instead of heavy outlines
chips and small tags often use muted grey fills; important tags may use gradient or dark fills
in the app view, the main canvas stays white while sidebars use slightly darker off-white to separate regions

typography.font_family_style: modern neo-grotesque sans (similar to Inter or SF Pro)
text_treatments: headings in sentence case with tight leading and slightly negative letter-spacing
body text left-aligned with comfortable line-height around 1.5
buttons mostly in sentence case; occasional all-caps micro-labels for small badges like status or version labels
secondary metadata uses lighter color and slightly smaller size
numeric stats often set in medium or semi-bold weight for emphasis

shapes: primary pill button with full border-radius (9999px)
secondary ghost pill with thin border
icon-only circular controls for media and small actions
icon_use: leading icons inside pill buttons for key CTAs
small glyphs inside settings buttons and segmented controls
states: default: solid fill (black or gradient) with white text
hover: slight darken or lightening plus subtle shadow increase
focus: soft outline or glow in primary color around button
disabled: reduced opacity with no shadow

text_fields.border_style: subtle 1px solid with light grey color
text_fields.focus_state: border and/or shadow tinted with primary color and slight elevation
text_fields.label_placement: labels above the field in smaller, muted text
text_fields.helper_text: optional line below input in smaller, grey text for hints or counts

sliders.thumb_style: solid circular handle with strong contrast
sliders.labeling: labels appear above the slider with left/right captions on each end for min/max descriptions

toggles.off_state: light grey track with white thumb
toggles.on_state: track filled with primary color or dark grey and white thumb shifted to the right

dropdowns.appearance: pill or rounded rectangle with text label and chevron icon
dropdowns.background: white with shadowed dropdown list when opened

cards.style: rounded, shadowed surfaces with strong hierarchy between header, content, and footer
cards.shadow: soft medium blur with low opacity to create lift from light background
header_patterns: title at top left with small label or badge above or beside it
optional icon or small avatar-like glyph on the left
footer_patterns: primary and secondary CTAs aligned horizontally at bottom
small meta text or tags in bottom-left or bottom-right
variants: light cards on light grey background
dark cards on black section background with soft inner shadows and gradients

top_nav.position: fixed or sticky at top with translucent or white background
top_nav.structure: left-aligned wordmark, centered nav links, right-aligned CTAs and account controls
top_nav.link_style: minimal text links with subtle hover underline or color change

sidebar.item_style: row with small icon and label, light grey pills for active items
sidebar.section_grouping: nav items grouped under small uppercase captions
sidebar.active_state: filled pill in off-white or subtle tint with bold text and possibly a dot or accent line

tabs.style: small segmented control with 2–3 options, underlined or filled for active state
tabs.active_state: darker text and small underline or pill background

breadcrumbs.usage: minimal; page titles used instead of full breadcrumb chains in app view

color_variants: light grey background with dark text for neutral statuses
dark or colored background with white text for highlighted statuses
gradient fills for highly promoted labels

code_or_demo_block.description: wide card that showcases a sample interface or preview within the hero; uses gradient accent strip and subtle rounded corners
code_or_demo_block.background: white with gradient accent inside or along top edge

stat_band.description: strip of brand or client logos in a horizontal row with muted monochrome styling

api_cards.description: dark section grid of feature cards describing external interfaces, each with concise content and CTAs
api_cards.style: dark surfaces with subtle borders and light text

property_panel.description: right-hand column listing controls like voice selection, model selection, sliders, and toggles stacked vertically with section titles
property_panel.background: white, separated from canvas by thin divider

status_bar.description: bottom strip indicating remaining credits or character count with tiny text and subtle icons
status_bar.alignment: left/right split across width of main canvas

elevation_and_borders.use_of_shadows: shadows are used sparingly for primary cards and floating panels to indicate interaction focus
elevation_and_borders.shadow_strength: soft, wide blur with low opacity; never harsh drop shadows
elevation_and_borders.borders: thin, low-contrast borders in light grey used for delineating sections, tables, and subtle card edges
elevation_and_borders.flat_elements: navigation bars and sidebars are mostly flat with only separators and background color shifts

icon_style.type: simple line or minimal filled icons with rounded corners

illustration_style.hero_illustrations: soft 3D or pseudo-3D cards with layered panels and gradients
illustration_style.color_usage: rich gradients with pink, purple, blue, and orange hues
illustration_style.shape_language: rounded rectangles, soft shadows, and overlapping layers to suggest depth and technology

implied_animations: gradient backgrounds may subtly shimmer or move in hero sections
buttons and cards likely scale up very slightly on hover with shadow increase
tab and slider changes are animated with smooth transitions
toggle switches slide the thumb with a short ease-in-out animation
state_changes: hover: increase in contrast, subtle elevation, or border emphasis
active: darker background tone and pressed shadow or inset effect
focus: soft colored outline or glow around focused controls
disabled: reduced opacity and muted text color
error: red border and small helper text below input
success/info: subtle color bars or badges rather than large banners

marketing_pages: on smaller screens, the top nav collapses to a single row with a menu button; CTAs stack below or move into a drawer
hero layout shifts from side-by-side content + card to vertically stacked with text first and preview card below
card grids reduce from 3-up to 2-up and then to single column
testimonial and partner logo rows likely become horizontal scrollable carousels on mobile
application_layout: left sidebar may collapse to icon-only bar on tablet and mobile
right property panel might slide in as overlay or stack below canvas on small screens
sliders and controls expand to full-width blocks, maintaining vertical stacking
status bar and character counters wrap to multiple lines if needed

tailwind_tokens.spacing_scale: use 4px base grid (Tailwind 1 = 4px); sections ~20 (80px), cards ~6 (24px), inline gaps ~3 (12px)

shadows.card: shadow-lg with low opacity, slightly blurred

typography.font_family: font-sans with system or Inter-like stack
typography.caption: text-xs text-neutral-500

components.primary_button: inline-flex items-center justify-center px-5 py-2.5 rounded-full text-sm font-medium text-white bg-neutral-900 hover:bg-neutral-800 transition
components.gradient_button: bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-400 via-amber-300 to-indigo-400 text-neutral-900 rounded-full
components.sidebar: w-56 bg-neutral-50 border-r border-neutral-200 flex flex-col

general_guidelines: build on an 8px or 4px spacing grid for consistent rhythm
prefer pill shapes for interactive elements and softer 16–24px radii for containers
limit gradient use to hero, key CTAs, and highlighted cards to keep the interface clean
use alternating light and dark sections to structure long marketing pages
keep sidebars slightly tinted relative to the main canvas to reinforce information hierarchy
